Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITag
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Tag
extends Object
implements ITag
    Base class for all SWF tags.
